summary.span: 表示抽象類別，這是 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 為了要執行序列化和還原序列化而衍生自 的類別。

span.span: Represents an abstract class that Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) derives from to do serialization and deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以從這個類別衍生類別來執行除了序列化以外的其他功能。You can derive from this class to do other functions than serialization. 請注意，您可能會在正規化 CDATA 區段中的換行字元時遇到問題，而這是個已知問題。Note that there is a known issue with the normalization of linefeed characters inside of CDATA sections that you may encounter.

MemberSignature.Value: protected XmlDictionaryWriter ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: XmlDictionaryWriter();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為這個類別是抽象的，所以只能叫用其衍生類別。Invoked only by its derived classes because this class is abstract.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool CanCanonicalize { get; }
.property instance bool CanCanonicalize
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CanCanonicalize As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanCanonicalize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 這個屬性永遠會傳回 。

span.span: This property always returns .

summary.span: 如果其衍生類別支援標準化，則可以覆寫它們來傳回 。

span.span: Its derived classes can override to return if they support canonicalization.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回`true`如果且只有這衍生的類別可以規範化寫入它，根據獨佔標準化 」 XML 規則中所定義的 XML 內容[獨佔 XML 規範化版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96655).Returns `true` if and only if this derived class of can canonicalize the XML content being written to it, according to the Exclusive XML Canonicalization rules as defined in [Exclusive XML Canonicalization Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96655).

summary.span: 建立 的執行個體，這個執行個體會使用訊息傳輸最佳化機制 (MTOM) 格式寫入 XML。

span.span: Creates an instance of that writes XML in the Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM) format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks MTOM 可讓使用者最佳化 SOAP 訊息內之原始二進位資料的傳輸。MTOM allows users to optimize the transmission of raw binary data within SOAP messages.

summary.span: 這個方法會查詢在指定之命名空間範圍中的前置詞。

span.span: This method looks up the prefix that is in scope for the given namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命名空間對應至目前的預設命名空間，則不會產生前置詞。If the namespace maps to the current default namespace, no prefix is generated. 在寫入屬性值時，如果找不到命名空間，這個方法會產生前置詞。When writing attribute values, this method generates a prefix if the namespace is not found. 在寫入項目內容時，如果找不到命名空間，就會擲回例外狀況。When writing element content, it throws an exception if the namespace is not found.

span.span: Writes a standard XML attribute in the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準 XML 屬性是具有前置詞 "xml" (大小寫不拘) 的屬性。A standard XML attribute is one with the prefix "xml" in any casing. 例如，`xml:space` 和 `xml:lang`。Examples are `xml:space` and `xml:lang`.
